comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Evening News, Monday 26 August 1889, p. 7. - "The Post master-General notified that it had been decided to erect a pillar-letter receiver at the corner of Homebush and Redmyre roads." - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/108101295

comment.author: 69269002@N04
comment._content: Great piece of research there! Thanks.
